title: biiiig probleeemm
body: hi guys! i have a biiig probleeeem!!! after choosing the champs in the room when the game charges and after it starts my screen turns black and i have to use the magical alt+f4 to exit...when i try to reconnect the same...and i can hear all the sounds, even type in chat...but i cant see nothing...its all black

replies.body: This sounds like the known bug listed on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). Try hitting *ALT+ENTER* once you start entering the loading screen as a workaround. I don't have an ETA on when the fix for this bug will roll out, but if you have anything else you need assistance with, let me know!
